xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 4 Saññojanagocchaka » 4.5 Saññojanasaññojanasampayuttaduka » 4.5.7 Pañhāvāra » 4.5.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 4.5.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Saññojanagocchaka
Saññojanasaññojanasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
111.
1600Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
1601Anulomaṃ.
<< 4.5.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
